Perfect Anatomy: extra fingers, mutated hands, deformed limbs, fused fingers, missing limbs, extra legs, bad anatomy, malformed, bones
Natural Anatomy: broken anatomy, dislocated joints, twisted limbs, impossible posture, malformed proportions
Symmetrical Face: asymmetric eyes, wandering eye, deformed face, melting features, crossed eyes, drooping face, lazy eye
Natural Face: perfectly symmetrical face, perfectly aligned pupils, mannequin face, doll-like face

Stable Pose: floating limbs, impossible body twist, broken neck, unnatural pose, hovering subject, dislocated shoulder
Geometric Precision: warped walls, melting architecture, liquid metal, distorted perspective, broken geometry, shaky lines
Clean Lines: blurry edges, ghosting, double outlines, chromatic aberration, smudged details, artifacts
Consistent Textures: muddled textures, repetitive patterns, noise, grain, flat skin, plastic look, uncanny valley
